message: PI: HST( Hackclub Standard Time). Because timezones are confusing so why not solve it by creating yet another one
Although some names are very weird: "Twitter" (sounds good now but imagine not having heard of it)
Maybe name it relating to that
What's special about your forum community thing?
Okay, the way I name stuff is either with acronyms or with puns on stuff
you don't need a name to start. Just begin developing and you’ll come up with something later
hi. i wanna build a forum community website so bad but im out of name ideas. all the names i came up with exists already. does anyone else have ideas?
if you're looking for specific recommendations, this one is awesome <https://workshops.hackclub.com/sound_galaxy/>

if you're looking for some cool project ideas, <http://workshops.hackclub.com|workshops.hackclub.com> has some great ones! there is also a list at the end of each workshop that tells you ways you can go further with the project
yes please
anyone have an idea for a github repo? i tried a lot but keep restarting.
what
PI: a hackclub for people who couldn't start one
oh damn
i would seriously consider making this if i could actually process how GitHub actions work

PI: GitHub action that connects commit messages and issue task lists, e.g. if a commit has the message add error handling (1 x 3) it will edit the body of issue #1 and check off the 3rd task found there
A program to take in a program and convert it to pig latin
But instead of replying what you said, it just says "lmao" back

#most-annoying-bots-of-all-time

PI: ArseCheckerBot: A bot for any platform that checks for people saying "lmao" that then replies with "Hmm, upon further investigation, we have found that your posterior is still connected to your body. Lying is bad."

what's the point of making the website if we can just do that on another networking site like put a bunch of links on a fb group...

nah
You mean like a slideshow showcasing website?

I kinda wanna do this lol but i wanna hear thoughts on it and if theres soemthing like it: a lot of people in hc have personal websites and a lot of people want to make them. What if we made like something like <https://www.awwwards.com/> to showcase personal websites that randomly rotate and without all the voting stuff. The main goal is to give new people ideas about design and the content they should add
